name: Creamy Location Demo
description:
Follow Mr Bean on the cameras, shut the correct door to stop him (You can only shut one door at a time)

Keep Mr Creamy wound up by using your flashlight 

(he sits behind you in the office)

Keep track of Teddy on the vent system and have the correct vent closed to stop him 

(only one vent can be closed at a time)

(switch closed vent by clicking on vent map)

When you get a little warning on your screen go to the cookie cove cam and shock Miss Wicket before she deactivates your doors, flashlight, vent lock, and office lights!

Boon always goes to the right side of the door, watching him on the cameras makes him move 5 times slower
